oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Misskelley friend says they attended cult event
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; Misskelley, Jessie Lloyd, Jr.; Echols, Damien Wayne; Baldwin, Charles Jason; 1990s; Hutcheson, Victoria;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Victoria Hutcheson testified that she attended a meeting of a satanic cult with Misskelley and Echols after the boys were killed. Includes a "Trial Highlights" sidebar.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sullivan, Bartholomew
